definition: (used of especially horses) having a brownish coat thickly sprinkled with white or grey, a horse having a brownish coat thickly sprinkled with white or gray
details:
adjective
- (used of especially horses) having a brownish coat thickly sprinkled with white or grey
= example: (used of especially horses) having a brownish coat thickly sprinkled with white or grey
noun
- a horse having a brownish coat thickly sprinkled with white or gray
- a soft sheepskin leather that is colored and finished to resemble morocco
